exceptions.exn: In environment pr : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop ii : InductiveInv pr I A : Type this : nid e : DT this V A i : state r : cont A i0 : ?M1562 \\In Coh V p : proc this V A i1 : p \\In code_of e scs : seq schedule Unable to unify "(fix always_sc (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p : proc this V A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc this V A -> Prop) {struct scs} : Prop := s1 \\In Coh V /\\ match scs with | [::] => forall s2 : state, network_rely V this s1 s2 -> P s2 p | sc :: scs' => forall s2 : state, network_rely V this s1 s2 -> [/\\ safe p sc s2, P s2 p & forall (s3 : state) (q : proc this V A), pstep s2 p sc s3 q -> always_sc A s3 q scs' P] end) A ?M1562 p scs (fun (s2 : state) (p2 : proc this V A) => forall v : A, p2 = Ret v -> (fun (x : A) (m : state) => I (getS m) (nodes pr (getS m)) -> ?M1563 x m) v s2)" with "(fix always_sc (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p : proc this V A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc this V A -> Prop) {struct scs} : Prop := s1 \\In Coh V /\\ match scs with | [::] => forall s2 : state, network_rely V this s1 s2 -> P s2 p | sc :: scs' => forall s2 : state, network_rely V this s1 s2 -> [/\\ safe p sc s2, P s2 p & forall (s3 : state) (q : proc this V A), pstep s2 p sc s3 q -> always_sc A s3 q scs' P] end) A i p scs (fun (s2 : state) (p2 : proc this V A) => forall v : A, p2 = Ret v -> (fun x : A => [eta r x]) v s2)".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
pr: protocol
I: dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop
ii: InductiveInv pr I
A: Type
this: nid
e: DT this V A
i: state
r: cont A

Goal:
verify i e (fun x : A => [eta r x]) -> verify i (with_inv ii e) r

Premises:
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
cont = fun A : Type => A -> state -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments cont _%type_scope
protocol = Protocols.protocol : Type
Inductive DT (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := with_spec : forall s : spec A, DTbin this W s -> DT this W A Arguments DT _ _ _%type_scope Arguments with_spec [this W] [A]%type_scope [s]
with_inv : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (A : Type) (this : nid), DT this (mkWorld pr) A -> DT this (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) A
verify : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> DT this W A -> (A -> state -> Prop) -> Prop
state = union_map Label dstatelet : Type
Notation V := (mkWorld pr)
nid = nat : Set
pred = fun T : Type => T -> bool : Type -> Type Arguments pred _%type_scope
InductiveInv = ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv : protocol -> (dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) -> Type Arguments InductiveInv _ _%function_scope
with_inv_rule' : forall (i : state) (r : cont A), verify i e (fun (x : A) (m : state) => I (getS m) (nodes pr (getS m)) -> r x m) -> verify i (with_inv ii e) r
Mem_map_inv : ?x \In [seq ?f i | i <- ?s] -> exists y : ?T, ?x = ?f y /\ y \In ?s where ?T : [pr : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop ii : InductiveInv pr I A : Type this : nid e : DT this V A i : state r : cont A |- Type] ?T' : [pr : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop ii : InductiveInv pr I A : Type this : nid e : DT this V A i : state r : cont A |- Type] ?f : [pr : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop ii : InductiveInv pr I A : Type this : nid e : DT this V A i : state r : cont A |- ?T -> ?T'] ?x : [pr : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid ->...-> Prop ii : InductiveInv pr I A : Type this : nid e : DT this V A i : state r : cont A |- seq ?T]
vrf_post : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (e : DT this W A) (i : state) (k : cont A), verify i e k -> verify i e (fun (x : A) (m : state) => forall m' : state, network_rely W this m m' -> k x m')
vrf_coh : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (e : DT this W A) (i : state) (r : A -> state -> Prop), (i \In Coh W -> verify i e r) -> verify i e r
step : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (e1 : DT this W A) (e2 : A -> DT this W B) (i : state) (r : cont B), verify i e1 (fun (y : A) (m : state) => verify m (e2 y) r) -> verify i (x <-- e1; e2 x) r
inject_rule : forall (this : nid) (W V : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type) (w : injects V W K) (e1 : DT this V A) (i j : state) (r : cont A), i \In Coh V -> verify i e1 (fun (x : A) (i' : state) => forall j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, i' \+ j' \In Coh W -> network_rely (inj_ext w) this j j' -> r x (i' \+ j')) -> verify (i \+ j) (iinject e1) r
ghC : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (e : DT this W A) (p : B -> pre) (q : B -> A -> pre), (forall (i : state) (x : B), p x i -> i \In Coh W -> verify i e (q x)) -> conseq e (logvar (fun x : B => binarify (p x) (q x)))
vrf_mono : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (e : DT this W A) (i : state) (r1 r2 : cont A), r1 <== r2 -> verify i e r1 -> verify i e r2
vrf_pre : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (e : DT this W A) (i i' : state) (k : cont A), verify i e k -> network_rely W this i i' -> verify i' e k
bind_rule : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (e1 : DT this W A) (e2 : A -> DT this W B) (i : state) (q : cont A) (r : cont B), verify i e1 q -> (forall (y : A) (j : state), q y j -> j \In Coh W -> verify j (e2 y) r) -> verify i (x <-- e1; e2 x) r
with_inv_has_spec : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (A : Type) (this : nid) (e : DT this (mkWorld pr) A), with_inv_prog ii (code_of e) \In has_spec this (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) (with_inv_s ii e)
ret_rule : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (i : state) (v : A) (r : cont A), (forall m : state, network_rely W this i m -> r v m) -> verify i (ret this W v) r
aft_ind_inv : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (A : Type) (this : nid) (p : proc this (mkWorld pr) A) (P : A -> state -> Prop) (i : state), i \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> after i p P -> after i (WithInv pr I ii (erefl (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii))) p) (fun (v : A) (m : state) => m \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) /\ P v m)
call_rule' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (i : state) (f : DT this W A) (k : cont A), (i \In Coh W -> pre_of f i) -> (forall (x : A) (m : state), post_of f i x m -> m \In Coh W -> k x m) -> verify i f k
call_rule : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (p : Pred state) (q : A -> Pred state) (i : state) (e : DHT[this,W](p,q)) (k : cont A), (i \In Coh W -> p i) -> (forall (x : A) (m : state), q x m -> m \In Coh W -> k x m) -> verify i (with_spec e) k
alw_ind_inv : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (A : Type) (this : nid) (p : proc this (mkWorld pr) A) (P : state -> proc this (mkWorld pr) A -> Prop) (i : state), i \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> always i p P -> always i (WithInv pr I ii (erefl (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii))) p) (fun (m : state) (q : proc this (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) A) => m \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) /\ ((exists q' : proc this (mkWorld pr) A, q = WithInv pr I ii (erefl (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii))) q' /\ P m q') \/ (exists v' : A, q = Ret v' /\ P m (Ret v'))))
with_inv_s : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop), InductiveInv pr I -> forall (A : Type) (this : nid), DT this (mkWorld pr) A -> spec A
act_rule : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this) (i : state) (r : cont A), (forall j : state, network_rely W this i j -> a_safe a j /\ (forall (y : A) (k m : state), (exists pf : a_safe a j, a_step pf k y) -> network_rely W this k m -> r y m)) -> verify i (act a) r
gh_ex : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A C : Type) (s : C -> spec A) (f : DTbin this W (logvar s)) (g : C) (i : state) (k : cont A), verify i (with_spec (Do with_spec f)) k -> verify i (with_spec f) k
EmptyProt = fun i : Label => Protocol i snd_uniq0 rcv_uniq0 : Label -> protocol
logvar = fun (B A : Type) (s : A -> spec B) => (fun i : state => exists x : A, (s x).1 i, fun (y : state) (i : B) (m : state) => forall x : A, (s x).2 y i m) : forall B A : Type, (A -> spec B) -> spec B Arguments logvar {B A}%type_scope _%function_scope
aftA : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P : B -> A -> state -> Prop), alwsafe s p -> after s p (fun (v : A) (s' : state) => forall x : B, P x v s') < -> (forall x : B, after s p (fun v : A => [eta P x v]))
with_inv_set : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (A : Type) (this : nid), prog (mkWorld pr) A this -> proc this (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) A -> Prop
with_inv_prog : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (A : Type) (this : nid), prog (mkWorld pr) A this -> prog (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) A this
getProtocol = fun (w : world) (i : Label) => match find i w with | Some p => p | None => EmptyProt i end : world -> Label -> protocol
binarify = fun (A : Type) (p : pre) (q : cont A) => (p, fun (i : state) (y : A) (m : state) => p i -> q y m) : forall A : Type, pre -> cont A -> spec A Arguments binarify {A}%type_scope
ProtocolWithInvariant.II : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (sts : seq (ProtocolWithInvariant.SendInv p I)) (rts : seq (ProtocolWithInvariant.ReceiveInv p I)), [seq ProtocolWithInvariant.st i | i <- sts] = snd_trans p -> [seq ProtocolWithInvariant.rt i | i <- rts] = rcv_trans p -> ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv p I
with_inv_coh : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (s : state), s \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithInvariant.ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> s \In Coh (mkWorld pr)
Record InductiveInv (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) : Type := II { sts : seq (ProtocolWithInvariant.SendInv p I); rts : seq (ProtocolWithInvariant.ReceiveInv p I); _ : [seq ProtocolWithInvariant.st i | i <- sts] = snd_trans p; _ : [seq ProtocolWithInvariant.rt i | i <- rts] = rcv_trans p } Arguments ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv _ _%function_scope Arguments ProtocolWithInvariant.II [p] [I]%function_scope [sts rts]%seq_scope
proc_ind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> Prop), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks) (i : injects V W K) (p : proc this V A), P V A p -> P W A (Inject i p)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
proc_rec : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> Set), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks) (i : injects V W K) (p : proc this V A), P V A p -> P W A (Inject i p)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
proc_sind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> SProp), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
proc_rect : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> Type), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks) (i : injects V W K) (p : proc this V A), P V A p -> P W A (Inject i p)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
aftI : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P : Prop) (Q : A -> state -> Prop), alwsafe s p -> after s p (fun (v : A) (s' : state) => P -> Q v s') < -> (P -> after s p (fun v : A => [eta Q v]))
with_inv_nodes : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (l : Label), nodes (getProtocol (mkWorld (ProtocolWithInvariant.ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) l) = nodes (getProtocol (mkWorld pr) l)
inject : forall (this : nid) (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type), injects V W K -> DT this V A -> DT this W A
with_inv_rely' : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (z : nid) (s1 s2 : state), network_rely (mkWorld (ProtocolWithInvariant.ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) z s1 s2 -> network_rely (mkWorld pr) z s1 s2
with_inv_step' : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (z : nid) (s1 s2 : state), network_step (mkWorld (ProtocolWithInvariant.ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) z s1 s2 -> network_step (mkWorld pr) z s1 s2
WithInv : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv p I), W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> proc this (mkWorld p) A -> proc this W A
aft_inject : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type) (w : injects V W K) (this : nid) (p : proc this V A) (P : A -> state -> Prop) (i j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), i \+ j \In Coh W -> after i p P -> after (i \+ j) (Inject w p) (fun (v : A) (m : state) => exists i' j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ m = i' \+ j', i' \In Coh V, network_rely (inj_ext w) this j j' & P v i'])
